---
title: Humeroulnar Joint
---

# Capsule

The a capsular restriction of the humeroulnar joint presents as a decrease in elbow flexion > elbow extension with ~4:1 ratio [@duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020].

# Closed vs Open Pack

- Open
    - 70&deg; flexion
    - 10&deg; supination
- Closed
    - Extension
